title: Loot Bug
body:
I played Taric on aram and i got 14/9 and S- rank I never got box with him, i have 4 boxes avalible, and i have not loot restrict 
http://prntscr.com/fokfy8 on this picture  you can see to i got S- rank
And here http://prntscr.com/fokg5n you can see to my Season Higest Rank is N/A how is taht even possbile? this isn't the first time to that is happening to me, but i ignored it beacuse i ussaly get a or b rank and it's not soo super, but now i got S- and no box i mean wtf?
Here are some proves:
i have 4 box avalible: http://prntscr.com/fokgyl
i have taric bought: http://prntscr.com/fokh7i
I really don't know what is happening;
As you can see this is all pictured at same time (down right corner of computer has a clock 04:00 h) soo i think it's enough prove to i'm not currently scamming you.
Can i please get my box, and can this bug be fixed?

replies.body: 48 hours later still nothing, can you answer me please?
24 hours later no diffrence i still don't have my box or mastery score as taric
Okay but i assume anything will change beacuse, as i said, this isn't first time this is happening to me.

It looks like that match just recently ended and hasn't fully been uploaded to the servers quite yet. Sometimes it can take a little bit for the rewards to be delivered as well, so be patient and let me know if you still haven't don't see any updates tomorrow.
I was in a party with him and got box from his S and he didn't. Come on Riot.
